Title: Joplin Twister Survival
Plot: The town of Joplin, Mo., is hit by a historic EF-5 tornado; 3-month-old Greyson Chaligoj ends up in the hands of a complete stranger when their paths cross in a local Walmart, as a tornado bears down on the city.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
